profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit

did.head: Overview
did.unittitle: Stanford University, Department of Chemistry, honors theses
did.abstract: Honors theses written by undergraduates in the Stanford University Dept. of Chemistry.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

acqinfo.p: Theses were transferred to the Stanford University Archives from the Hume Writing Center in 2011.

accessrestrict.head: Information about Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research use; materials must be requested at least 48 hours in advance of intended use. No photocopies may be made.

userestrict.head: Ownership & Copyright
userestrict.p: Copyright is retained by the creator for materials they have authored or otherwise produced. Transmission or reproduction of materials requires the written permission of the copyright owner.

prefercite.head: Cite As
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Stanford University, Department of Physics, Honors Theses (SC4-3730). Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of honors theses written by undergraduates in the Stanford University Dept. of Chemistry.

did.unittitle: Huang, Joy Y., Elasticotaxis: response of myxobacterial cells to elastic forces in their substrate.
Mukherjee, Kaushisk, The use of peptide nucleic acid and carbocyanine dyes to scan for mutations in the cystic fibrosis transmembrane regulator gene.
